about.title: About Me
about.description: I'm a passionate full-stack developer with a love for creating helpful tools. With expertise in modern technologies like SvelteKit and Node.js, I enjoy building user-friendly applications that solve real-world problems. When I'm not coding, you can find me exploring new technologies, contributing to open-source projects, or sharing my knowledge with the developer community through writing and speaking.

project-supportmail.title: SupportMail
project-supportmail.description: A modern Discord Modmail bot, including the bot itself (built with Node.js and Typescript) and surrounding services such as a website built with SvelteKit. A dashboard is currently in development.

project-burningdezibelz.title: Burning Dezibelz
project-burningdezibelz.description: The website for the Burning Dezibelz band (which I am a member of). Built with SvelteKit and Supabase, it showcases the band, concerts and has a gallery for our images. It has a dashboard for managing concerts, venues, images and more.

project-portfolio.title: Portfolio
project-portfolio.description: This portfolio website, built with SvelteKit, showcases my projects and skills. It serves as a platform to share my work and connect with others in the developer community.

project-lukez-monitor.title: LukeZ Monitor
project-lukez-monitor.description: A Cloudflare Worker that monitors the status of my various projects and services. It checks for uptime and notifies me via Telegram if any issues arise.

project-djs-command-helper.title: DJS Command Helper
project-djs-command-helper.description: An npm package that provides a simple way to manage application commands with Discord.js.

project-timestring-py.title: TimestringPy
project-timestring-py.description: A Python port of the NPM Timestring package. It allows you to parse human-readable time strings into seconds or a specified return unit. Also allows more configuration options than the original package.

connect.title: Let's Connect
connect.description: Feel free to reach out to me on any of the platforms below.
